query: Water is leaking near the breaker box—do I tighten anything or call someone?
Ceiling started sagging after last night’s storm, even though the pipes seem fine.
Dishwasher keeps tripping the breaker every time I run it. Is that normal?
Water drips from the bathroom fan whenever it rains. Roof looks okay from outside.
Installed a new sink and now the nearby outlet buzzes and feels warm. Should I worry?
